entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
